subject: Order #SSN5726
description_text:
Hello,

I am writing to ask for an update regarding my order, as I have not yet
received any shipping confirmation or tracking number.

*Order details:*
Order number: SSN5726
Order date: January 4, 2026
Name: Nikos Xalkias
Email: nikosxalkias522@gmail.com
Shipping country: Greece
Payment method: Card

It has now been *6 days since I placed the order*. I would also like to
point out that I *paid extra for faster shipping*, which is why I am
concerned about the lack of updates so far.

Could you please let me know:

   -

   The current status of my order
   -

   Whether it has been shipped
   -

   The tracking number (if available)
   -

   An estimated delivery date

If you need any additional information from me, please let me know.

Thank you in advance for your assistance. I look forward to your reply.

Kind regards,
Nikos Xalkias

conversations.body_text: Hello,  I placed an order on January 4th through your website and completed full payment, but I have not received any tracking number and no response to my previous emails.  At this point, the order appears not to have been shipped.  Please provide a valid tracking number within 48 hours of this email.  If I do not receive a response or tracking number within this timeframe, I will proceed with a PayPal/card chargeback for non-delivery of goods.  I hope this can be resolved immediately.  Regards, Nikos Xalkias
